snippet.title: Sonic Hack - Sonic 2 co-op
snippet.description:
If you enjoyed watching this video please give us thumbs up, leave a comment below and share this video with others! Press the bell icon to get notified about new videos. It will greatly help us make more content like this.

Sonic 2 Co-op is a ROM hack developed by Undying Star and his team, aiming to make the entirety of the 1992 classic title 'Sonic the Hedgehog 2' for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive, into an entirely co-operative adventure. The hack includes custom music, custom palletes, as well as a fully co-operative campaign mode, even with Tails' abilities from Sonic the Hedgehog 3. The demo includes (Emerald Hill Zone, Chemical Plant Zone, Hill Top Zone, Mystic Cave Zone And Hidden Place Zone!)

Download: https://shc.zone/entries/contest2023/795

More Sonic videos: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLfK4fPfz33dxDNGGzPBJKipDzLzhRbWWu

Join our Discord server: https://dc.railgun.works/RazorAndZenon
Watch us live on Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/zenon_the_sonicfan

#SonicHacks #SonicMods #SonicFanGames #SonicTheHedgehog #Sonic
